nodes.text: Lake Paonga was a lake located on the planet of Naboo. The underwater capital of the Gungans, Otoh Gunga, was located in the lake. As the Trade Federation invaded Naboo, Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn and his Padawan apprentice Obi-Wan Kenobi were led to Lake Paonga by the Gungan Jar Jar Binks so they could meet with his people.
Outside of the Gungans, Lake Paonga was home to a plethora of other life, including yobshrimp and several varieties of scalefish.
